    		Financial Services
    	What We DoFinancial Services is a customer service unit of California State University, Chico which provides financial management to meet our campus business needs.Our MissionOur mission is to provide a complete package of University-related financial services which is responsive to the needs and desires of students and their families, faculty, staff, and members of the community with whom we do business. It is an extension of our attitude and desire to achieve excellence in customer-responsive fiscal service and compels us to provide appropriate solutions through technology, enhanced human performance, and spirited teamwork.Our Departments
                        Financial Accounting and Reporting
                    
                        Accounts Payable
                    
                        University Budget Office
                    
                        Student Financial Services
                    How Can We Help?Expand All | Collapse AllAre you in an Administrative Support role and looking for resources?Please review the Administrative Support Resources page(opens in new window) for general campus organization, processes, and operational information. Are you a student or parent looking to make a tuition or fee payment?Please visit Student Financial Services, call 530-898-5936, or walk in at SSC Room 230.Do you have a question about Financial Aid?Please visit the Financial Aid and Scholarship Office, call 530-898-6451, or walk in at SSC Room 250.If you need special accommodation to access any document on this page, please contact the Office of Accessible Technology and Services at 530-898-6532 or oats@csuchico.edu.Division of Business & FinanceVice President for Business & FinanceZip Code: 95929-0025www.csuchico.edu/vpbfDepartmentsAudit ServicesDistribution ServicesEnvironmental Health and SafetyFacilities Management and ServicesFinancial ServicesHuman Resources Service CenterProcurement & Contract ServicesRisk ManagementStaff CouncilUniversity Budget OfficeUniversity Police
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
